ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
ReviewTitle: We need a scent free version
Review: This is a nice lightweight product that is surprisingly hydrating, I put it on just after toning and before heavier treatments/moisturizer. Also contains no alcohol!!Don't expect miracles if your acne is particularly severe. This is a gentle product to use alongside other acne treatments for best results.My only negative is it is very very highly fragranced. It's exceptionally strong and I wish they made a fragrance free version. Also when I first purchased this product from Amazon in 02/2021 the product I received had an expiry date of 10/2021, just over 8 months. It also had a sticker on top that said it expired in 2023 that when peeled off revealed the 2021 expiry date, which is bizarre and shady. I finished the bottle before that time, but still.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Product works great. I’m 38 and have been getting acne due to wearing a mask during covid. This cream helps clear up within a couple days and sometimes even overnight. Love this product and will continue to buy. I have mild acne only. I wanted to wait till I tried product for at least a month before I gave review. I highly recommend. It removes acne without drying skin out. Love it.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Within 1 month of using it, my acne and scars is now much much much much better!!!!

ReviewTitle: LOVE IT for anyone dealing with "maskne"
Review: Face masks for COVID were wreaking havoc on my skin. I started using this Vichy lotion and cleanser and I am ASTOUNDED by how much better my skin is doing. It feels lovely on, nice and light, soft grassy sort of smell and my skin is 1,000x better. I am a huge fan.

ReviewTitle: Combate la producción de sebo super bien
Review: Lo estoy usando por indicaciones de mi dermatologa y la verdad estoy encantada, soy piel grasa y la verdad que de estarlo usando un poco más de un mes, estoy notando resultados, esta crema hidrata super bien y lo mejor es el control de sebo, eso es lo que me hace muy feliz, un excelente producto. No olviden que es necesario acudir con el derma para que los diseñe una rutina adecuada a nuestras necesidades.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Kurze Vorgeschichte: Ich habe Pickel und Unreinheiten seit ich 10 Jahre alt bin, war schon bei verschiedenen Hautärzten, sogar mit Strahlentherapie und habe allmögliche Produkte in den letzten 17 Jahren (heute bin ich 27 J.). ausprobiert. Von Masken, bis teure Cremes aus der Apotheke bis hin zu Kosmetik Behandlungen.Ich habe nicht viel Hoffnung in dieses Produkt gesetzt, wollte es jedoch gerne mal ausprobieren.Ich reinige 2x täglich mein Gesicht mit klarem Wasser (auf viele Reinigungsprodukte reagiere ich allergisch oder vertrage ich nicht). Habe nach jeder Reinigung dieses Produkt aufgetragen.Meine Erfahrungen: Es ist kein Wunderheilmittel. Ich habe einfach sehr unreine und schwierige Haut. Damit werde ich leben müssen. Dennoch ist meine Haut deutlich schöner als vorher. Meine Haut ist nicht so trocken, ist durch dieses Produkt weicher und glatter. Meine Unreinheiten entzünden sich kaum noch, meine Haut wirkt nicht mehr so strapaziert.Ich hatte nicht viel Hoffnung rein gesetzt und benutze es jetzt seit ca. 6 Wochen und meine Haut sieht wirklich gut aus - im Vergleich zu vorher. Ich bin wirklich sehr zufrieden, da ich auf sowas wirklich sehr lange gewartet habe. Ich kann die Creme als gute Basis benutzten um Make-Up auftragen. Der Geruch ist angenehm; zwischenzeitlich hab ich den Geruch von leichter Minze (vielleicht täusche ich mich ja und verwechsele dies) die sehr erfrischend ist und auch für meinen Partner als angenehm empfunden wird.Fazit: Kaufempfehlung! Ich bin wirklich sehr zufrieden, dieses Produkt zu Hause zu haben und habe nach einer langen Zeit mal wieder das Gefühl, dass es meiner Haut deutlich besser geht. Ich habe trotzdem weiterhin Unreinheiten und Pickel - aber noch nie so wenig und so gut im Griff wie jetzt.Viel Spaß damit!

Review: Fantastico! Ormai non ne posso più fare a meno...quando finirà lo ricomprerò.Prodotto top. Grazie.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Ho aspettato un po’ prima di recensire questa crema, sperando che i risultati sarebbero stati visibili nel tempo ma purtroppo non è stato così.Io ho una pelle grassa e anziché sebonormalizzarla questa crema va ad accentuare la lucidità anziché toglierla.Dopo più di un mese di utilizzo le imperfezioni come brufoli e punti neri sono addirittura peggiorati. PESSIMO ACQUISTO. Non compratela se avete pelle grassa/mista perche non fa nulla di ciò che promette.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Finalmente ho trovato un prodotto valido ed EFFICACE! Non avete idea di quanti anni persi dietro a una marea di prodotti che puntualmente, nei casi “migliori” mi deludevano, nei casi “peggiori” invece mi ustionavano la pelle (prodotti ben conosciuti in farmacia). Ho iniziato questo prodotto in un momento di totale sconforto e dopo pochi giorni è avvenuta la magia!!! L’unica cosa che posso consigliare è di non utilizzarla come base trucco perché tende a non agevolare la stesura del make-up. Per il resto: TUTTA LA VITA!!!!

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Se siente bien en la piel, es ligero, se absorbe rápido; sin embargo, el olor puede llegar a ser desagradable y no siento que me ayude a combatir imperfecciones, he probado otros productos que tienen la misma concentración de ac. salicílico con buenos resultados y con este producto no ha sido así.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: La adoro. Mi era capitato di testarla in precedenza tramite campioncini e piccole dosi, ora mi sono decisa ad acquistare il flacone. Come prezzo non c'è male. La sto usando da poco più di una settimana quindi mi sembra prematuro dare opinioni a lungo termine. Senz'altro posso già dire che di questa crema apprezzo la delicatezza, si assorbe molto velocemente e non lascia la pelle unta, ha un buon odore e non è affatto grassa (attenzione se si ha la pelle di partenza un po' secca perché potrebbe peggiorare la situazione).

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
ReviewTitle: Buon prodotto anche per pelli sensibili
Review: Lo uso insieme al detergente della stessa linea per pelli grasse/tendenti al grasso. La texture è gelatinosa, molto leggera e sul viso si assorbe molto meglio rispetto alle classiche creme anche se rimane un pò appiccicosa. Dovrebbe essere anche idratante, ma io vi consiglio di applicare comunque una buona crema idratante al di sopra oppure, se avete paura che si possa ungere la faccia, potete mettere un siero idratante. Dovrebbe eliminare le imperfezioni ma non fa miracoli, qualche piccolo miglioramento lo si vede dopo qualche settimana di utilizzo ma nulla di eclatante. Anche questo come il detergente non presenta alcol e solo poco profumo, quindi è adatto anche a pelli sensibili.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
ReviewTitle: Prodotto ideale per pelli miste/grasse a tendenza acneica
Review: E' un prodotto ottimo per il mio problema, che si è accentuato con l'uso progressivo della mascherina. Io ho una pelle delicata e devo stare molto attenta a quale crema viso usare. Ho usato tante creme più o meno costose, ma da oggi in poi userò solo creme farmaceutiche come questa, infatti, il prodotto sta risolvendo il mio problema, senza causare nessuna irritazione al mio viso. Consigliatissimo!!!

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Minus 1 Stern da: Kam 2 Wochen zu spät und die Verpackung sah so aus.Aber ich muss sagen, dass es mir ABSTAND die beste Creme bei Unreinheiten ist. Ich hab mich quer durch probiert ( Clinique, Laroche, aesthetico & sonstigen Cremes vom Kosmetiker). Ich nutze die Creme + das dazugehörige Reinigungsgel + einer Creme vom Hautarzt. Mir persönlich hat es super geholfen. Meine Haut ist so gut wie ewig nicht.Ich nutze alle Produkte konsequent 2 mal täglich seit 4 Wochen.Creme zieht schnell ein und gibt einen super frischen Gefühl.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
ReviewTitle: Buono, ma informarsi bene sulle caratteristiche.
Review: Tutto sommato buono ma attenzione in caso di belle sensibile o secca, a me personalmente utilizzato da solo ha seccato troppo la pelle (probabilmente più indicato per pelli grasse ) . Utilizzato insieme ad un’altra crema “ricca” ha dato l’effetto desiderato, ovvero di ridurre i bruffoletti.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
ReviewTitle: No me funcionó como a los demás.
Review: Había visto muy buenas reseñas del producto, sin embargo, lo he estado usando desde hace más de un mes y no veo mejora o cambio. Lo uso 1 ves al día aplicando 3 gotas, una en la frente y a los lados de la cara. Afortunadamente no me ha sacado más imperfecciones ni ningún otro daño a la piel, sin embargo, esperaba más de esto tomando en cuenta que a muchos les funcionaba.No digo que el producto no funcione, sino que simplemente en mí no vi cambio alguno. Tal vez sea porque lo usaba solito y no con toda la línea completa que vende Vichy.Me terminaré lo poco que queda, pero no lo compraría de nuevo.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Mi piel es mixta-grasa con tendencia a acné y esta crema ha disminuido notablemente mis brotes, la producción de sebo y me ha ayudado con las marcas que tenía. Tiene fragancia en su fórmula y aunque mi piel es sensible al estar en casi último lugar es imperceptible. Definitivamente seguiré usándola y la recomiendo completamente, mi único pero es que al usarla día y noche calculo que los 50ml que trae sólo me durarán alrededor de 2 meses, pero bueno lo vale.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Empezando por el envio, llego en un tiempo mas rapido de lo esperado y en perfectas condiciones.Lo compre principalmente por un brote de acné por estres, esto salvo mi piel en muchos aspectos. Mejoro muchisimo la textura y el tono de mi piel, seco mis granitos, incluso había unos que los secaba en una sola noche de uso, los desinflama y los hace mas pequeños, desde que lo uso casi no me salen granitos y los que me salen se seca super rapido sin dejar la marca tan oscura. Me dio muchisma luminosidad, la piel luce sana y glowy.Este producto es genial para personas que quieran introducir el acido salicílico a su rutina porque viene acompañado de otros ingredientes, entre ellos el acido hialuronico y hace que no sea un producto agresivo. Tiene un poco de aroma como a menta, viene al final de la lista de ingredientes, asique viene en muy poca cantidad.A pesar de que es producto para piel grasa, es muy hidratante, para nada deja la cara mate, ni seca, ni acartonada, de hecho no sentí que me controlara la producción de sebo, mi cara siguió siendo grasa pero sin menos imperfecciones. Una joya!

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Me encantó el productoDesde la primera aplicaciónLa piel cambiaEn tan solo unos minutosEl productoViene bien empacadoSin ningún problemaY es original .Lo recomiendo mucho .

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
ReviewTitle: Indispensable en tu rutina si eres de piel mixta grasa
Review: Excelente para pieles grasas es ligera y ayuda mucho para pieles grasas y uso en combinación con el jabón líquido de la misma línea y he visto mejoría sobre todo por el acné que me salía en mi ciclo casi desapareció o es mínimo.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Ho comprato questo prodotto perché da un po di tempo sul mio viso sono comparse delle imperfezione, il prodotto è valido e svolge il suo compito, se utilizzato con costanza attenua le imperfezioni e i punti neri, in più ho molto apprezzato la consistenza, idrata e lascia una piacevole sensazione di freschezza.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: È il secondo flacone che acquisto, mi sto trovando benissimo perché la mia pelle ha delle impurità soprattutto sulle guance quindi la mantiene pulita ma allo stesso tempo con un effetto idratante. Consistenza leggera e senso di freschezza, buon prezzo, consegna perfetta.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: The product arrived earlier than expected. The only thing, that I would say, that could be improved is the package... the small glass bottle arrived in a box... while the product could perfectly be delivered in an envelop.The product itself is very good... it is very useful for people who have light acne problems and dry skin (mostly during winter).

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Mi Dermatologa me lo recomendó ya que tiendo en el día ponerme muy grasosa de la cara, entonces me dio muestras para que lo probara y ME ENAMORE. Siento que si controla mi brillo aunque no demasiado, no lo siento grasoso y siento que mi hidrata muy bien. Lo único malo fue que cuando ya pedí este para seguir el tratamiento llego la caja rota y no me dio tanta confianza, pero el producto en si se ve bien. Espero si sea el original

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Cheirinho "verde" suave. Testei e realmente deixa a pele sequinha após aplicação e aveludada, ainda não usei a longo prazo. Bem embalado.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Me encantó este suero, se utiliza antes de la crema facial y deja una textura en la piel muy suave y ayuda con el control de brillo, además cuando me sale un granito ayuda a que se desinflame más rápido. Súper recomendado!

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: No me gusto que viniera rota la caja del producto por abajo, me hace dudar de si es original o lo rellenaron. El olor del producto no me convence, aunque no he tenido alguna reacción alérgica. Si matifica e hidrata por algunas hrs. Tiene bastante producto, el botecito es de 50 ml.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Super recomendado para personas con tendencia acneica, yo llevo usándolo 2 años , antes usaba la crema de día y de noche para el acné, pero esto producto funciona muy similar, lo uso de día y de noche, puede resecar un poco pero yo uso otros productos hidratantes de la marca, estoy casada con la marca desde hace 10 años, super recomiendo sus productos para piel sensible.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Produto maravilhoso já nos primeiros se percebe o resultado. Indico procurar um dermatologista e também usar em associação a outros produtos pra quem tem a pele com muita acne.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: La verdad es que Vichy es sinónimo de calidad, pero este producto es una maravilla, cierra los poros, combate el acné (obvio leve) y las manchitas, no reseca nada al contrario deja súper hidratada y luminosa la piel, vale mil la pena

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: Mi piel es mixta-grasa y la verdad que me controla mucho la producción de sebo, tiene una textura de gel, con un agradable aroma y después de varios meses usándolo puedo decir que si sentí la diferencia, ahora es parte de mi kit diario.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: La mayoría de los productos para pieles con tendencia acnéica tienden a resecar la piel, este producto me deja la sensación de hidratación profunda y han disminuido considerablemente mis brotes acnéicos. Definitivamente recomendado!

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: El serum funciona muy bien, me ha ayudado ha eliminar varias imperfecciones de mi rostro, también tiene un olor tenue a hierbas y la textura es agradable. Sin embargo, yo solo lo utilizo una vez al día, ya que si lo uso dos veces me seca la cara

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
ReviewTitle: Ottimo prodotto per la pelle mista

ReviewTitle: Smooth Texture; Gorgeous Packaging; Okay Acne Control
Review: This moisturizer is my first experience using a product from Vichy Laboratories. This acne control daily moisturizer comes as part of the Normaderm Phytoaction line.For quick reference, I have mature, sensitive, product-sensitive, fair, acne-prone, congestion-prone, combination skin. I've battled some form of acne for the last 30+ years. These days it is well managed with gentle but consistent use of topical acne medications (which are applied only a few nights a week, not every time I wash my face).Per the description: "Discover Vichy Normaderm PhytoAction Acne Control Daily Moisturizer that helps to clear acne and visibly improve skin tone and texture. Formulated with 2% Salicylic Acid, Pure Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin C, this clinically tested formula specifically targets acne blemishes, blackheads & enlarged pores. Refreshing, light-weight texture easily glides onto skin & is absorbed quickly. Leaves skin feeling soothed & hydrated. Suitable for oily, acne-prone & sensitive skin types. Suitable for adult acne."What I like:The vibrant, emerald green glass bottle is lovely. You get 1.69oz of product in a hygienic pump. The lotion is light-weight, gel-like, and absorbs quickly into the skin. It is oil-free, silicone-free, non-greasy, and mattifying.Ingredients (I have noted what some are in the parathesis):ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Salicylic Acid 2% (acne treatment)INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: water, glycerin (humectant), isononyl isononanoate (emollient/skin softening agent), butylene glycol (an organic alcohol typically derived from petroleum and used as a humectant, solvent, emollient), kaolin (natural clay mineral), zinc sulfate (an astringent with antimicrobial properties/stabilizer), bifida ferment lysate (probiotic), sodium hydroxide (lye - stabilize pH), sodium polyacrylate (thickening agent/texture enhancer), sodium hyaluronate (hyaluronic acid), sodium benzoate (preservative), phenoxyethanol (preservative), ascorbyl glucoside (converts into l-ascorbic acid, aka Vitamin C), hydrolyzed algin (usually sourced from brown seaweed), trisodium ethylenediamine disuccinate (chelating agent), biosaccharide gum-1, acrylates / C10-30 alkylacrylate crosspolymer, fragrance (no idea what they use to scent it, but it is strong and minty).You can do your own research online to confirm the accuracy and safety of the aforementioned ingredients.What I don't like:Unlike their claims on the box, I do not think this acne lotion is suitable for sensitive skin or anyone who is scent-sensitive.But first, when I reached out to the manufacturer and asked about the product's pH, I was rebuffed. I was concerned about pH because typically, you don't want to mix SA with Vitamin C in the same routine, simultaneously, as one can affect the other's pH and result in one or both becoming inert or ineffective. I only wanted a confirmation that this product had been pH'ed properly (asking for a range). Instead, I was lectured about how pH didn't matter in skincare and told it was proprietary information. pH matters to me.I'll have to assume it has been pH'ed somehow since the product does have lye in it.pH questions aside, the general use of the acne lotion is okay. The active ingredient is 2% SA, which is a well-known, effective acne-management ingredient. But it is in countless over-the-counter and cosmeceutical topical acne treatments at every price point. So when we focus solely on the active ingredient in this acne lotion, ~$29 (at the time of purchase) for a 1.69oz bottle of 2% SA is a hint high. Especially when you consider this has unnecessary added fragrance (strong minty scent). I think you are paying more for the branding and the quality grade of the packaging than you are the formula, in my opinion.As someone with sensitive, acne-prone skin, I'd rather have something with this same packaging and quick-absorbing texture but fragrance-free. Vichy went through all the trouble of making sure this acne lotion is: non-comedogenic, oil-free, paraben-free, silicone-free, non-greasy, non-drying, and beautifully packaged but felt the need to ruin it with added fragrance. Vichy calls it an "allergy-tested formula with light fragrance," which is subjective. To me, it is heavy, minty, and lingers, and did cause me to have sneezing fits whenever I used it.They are not transparent about what they scent with. What if I'm allergic to whatever synthetic chemical or essential oil used to enhance the smell of this product? But I wouldn't know unless I used it. And some people, like myself, break out when they have a poor reaction to added fragrance (as it can be sensitizing). I will note, that was not the case here, but it does happen.This would be a great acne lotion if it were fragrance-free (or available in an unscented version) and if they provided some information on pH for those of us concerned about it.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: I have had the opportunity to use Vichy products in the past, and have always found then to be well made quality products. This acne daily moisturizer is no exception to those experiences. It comes very nicely bottled in an attractive emerald green bottle, but admittedly, I'm sure you care more about how well it works, or poorly it works for that matter. Well it doesn't work poorly at all, in my experience. I have acne prone skin, and always have, however my condition is not very severe at all, so I do not need an aggressive cream, or medicated whatever to control my breakouts. I simply get a pimple or two now and then, perhaps similar to what most people deal with. I do like to get that under control the best I can, and for that, this acne moisturizer is very effective. I found it to be very gentle, and even subtle if that is even a way to describe an acne cream. What I mean by that is that it isn't greasy, or on the opposite side of that spectrum, something that would dry me out or react negatively with my skin. It goes on nice and easy, saturates well, and hydrates ok. I do wish that for a moisturizer that it would hydrate better if I'm honest, because as I do get a dry spot or two on my face, I have found that those dry spots still materialize with this moisturizer. So I still need to apply another cream to get rid of that. For my acne control though, it was very effective, and I noticed a lot less breakouts, and severe pimples.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: This isn't a bad moisturizer by any means. It works nicely enough for acne -- about as well as using Yves medicated apricot scrub (and its equivalents). Salicylic acid goes a long way in helping hormonal and moderate-to-mild acne; as I understand it, it causes skin "turnover". I think it might go better in an exfoliant, generally, because you also slough off that skin.As a drugstore moisturizer, it's pretty average to above average; I just expect a bit more out of skin care. The best thing I'll say is that it didn't make my acne any worse, at all, though I do exfoliate near-daily, so that would keep there from being a dead skin buildup from the salicylic acid. Finally, I do really like the gel texture -- most people with blemish-prone skin who moisturize have swapped from cremes to gels and should like this, too.

Review: This acne-treating lotion has 2% salicylic acid, which is a standard treatment. You can get any number of over-the-counter products with this concentration. So, the main benefit of this lotion is that it is moisturizing at the same time. Those two attributes are rarely combined successfully. The lotion is light and absorbs well. The scent is somewhat strong -- I always prefer unscented products. It's a pricey line of products, but you can make up your mind about cost.

ProductName: Vichy Facial Moisturizer for Acne, Normaderm Double-Action Anti-Acne Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin with Salicylic Acid, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Hypoallergenic, Paraben-Free, 50mL
Review: My teen has a lot of acne breakouts and needed help getting them under control. She has tried various facial cleaners but they were not always very effective when used alone. Some were too strong and had burning sensations. We had her try this Vichy acne treatment and she was delighted by the outcome. Not only the outbreaks retreated quickly, it also helped stop future outbreaks while she was using it. It's expensive and only comes in a small bottle but it's worth it.
